translations: 新手；（第一年参加比赛的）新队员

sentences.sentence: I don't want to have another rookie to train.
sentences.translation: 我不想再训练一个新手。

sentences.sentence: The year he spent around his team last season leaves him better prepared than any other rookie.
sentences.translation: 上个赛季，他在他的球队经历一年的一切使他比任何菜鸟都更有准备。
新人瑞安·施雷德扮演福尔摩斯。
